channel.title: RevonX 24/7 | Your journey begins here
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/hYYIRUQ.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=large][b][u]Introduction[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[i]RevonX is a new server with owner's that have years of experience coding RSPS. We have much to offer if just joined. Within the 3 day's of uptime we been able to gather 75$ in donation's which all goes toward's the server. We have recently bought a VPS and a .Com for our server and site. We are now 24/7![/i]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/HTkkeyY.png[/img] [url=http://revonx.com/forums/][b]Forums[/b][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fj8uOaK.png[/img] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ut23mw5jsmgjpe1/revonx.jar][b]Play Now![/b][/url]
[b][size=medium]The Development Team[/size][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/m5dnGdV.gif[/img] [b]Adam[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qG7DzAK.gif[/img] [b]Iriisqx[/b][/center]
[size=large][b]Features[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Fully Working Dung [*]All skill's trainable [*]Voting system. [*]Automatic donation system. [*]Donator Zone. [*]Competitive Player's. [*]24/7. [*]Server with exceptions of a couple of items. [*]Economy. [*]Clean and professional. [*]Clipped following [*]Clipped NPC's [*]Unique Home. [*]Buy "X" Sell "X". [*]Most if not all dupes fixed. [*]Comp Cape. [*]Updated on a daily basis. [*]Active owners. [*]Nice community. [*]Amazing PvP System. [*]Multiple Bosses. [*]Functional Skillcapes. [*]Working Godswords. [*]Slow Experience gain. [*]Great Staff. [*]Great active skills including Hunter. [*]Pk, Skilling, Quest, Minigame & Boss server [*]Reward Shops, for Pking, Skilling, Voting, Slayer. [*]Join Today and Enjoy The fun![/ul]
[b][size=large]Why RevonX?[/size][/b]
[ul][*]RevonX has a great community of player's inwhich are active and love to play because the server is just addicting.We strive for excellence and that's what we've carried on with this server, has wonderful caring staff who take there time outof having fun playing to help you. Then we got the great economy. Economy is perfected we got the correct shop's,drops and skill's to boost your wealth. The server is almost always being update so no worries for any bug's dupes etc as they have most likely already been patched. Donator's in our server are the people who keep the system running as all our earnings goes towards the server for next month's vps and such! So when donating its not going to the wrong place. Hope you guys take the time to check out RevonX and eventually stay. Thank you![/ul]
[center][size=large][b]Media:[/b][/size] [spoiler] [img]http://i.imgur.com/noz6ZZ4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4mLfUGT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/J1qoumk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SZZlRdi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6U5T556.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tZLzcoO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FQD4jMA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/L85ZyzR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/P9Ftrr6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6g9vWdW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/reJKIEL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7jLtPRD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XCaNnHh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/B1TwgxD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DHnj7jT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0g5duhO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/c1rtOGi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LXliSpl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w40CcGZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XqfUIhF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nBE3Ed7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZMrUfUN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zYhqFlG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4YFPQz4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xUrqZIB.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[b][size=x-large]Hope to see newbies in-game![/size][/b]
[/center]

item.title: RevonX 24/7 | Your journey begins here

item.description:
@ace22shox wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][size=large]Introduction[/size][/center]

RevonX is a new server with owner’s that have years of experience coding RSPS. We have much to offer if just joined. Within the 3 day’s of uptime we been able to gather 75$ in donation’s which all goes toward’s the server. We have recently bought a VPS and a .Com for our server and site. We are now 24/7!

[center] Forums
Play Now!

[size=medium]The Development Team[/size]
Adam
Iriisqx[/center]

[size=large]Features[/size]

[ul][]Fully Working Dung
[]All skill’s trainable
[]Voting system.
[]Automatic donation system.
[]Donator Zone.
[]Competitive Player’s.
[]24/7.
[]Server with exceptions of a couple of items.
[]Economy.
[]Clean and professional.
[]Clipped following
[]Clipped NPC’s
[]Unique Home.
[]Buy “X” Sell “X”.
[]Most if not all dupes fixed.
[]Comp Cape.
[]Updated on a daily basis.
[]Active owners.
[]Nice community.
[]Amazing PvP System.
[]Multiple Bosses.
[]Functional Skillcapes.
[]Working Godswords.
[]Slow Experience gain.
[]Great Staff.
[]Great active skills including Hunter.
[]Pk, Skilling, Quest, Minigame & Boss server
[]Reward Shops, for Pking, Skilling, Voting, Slayer.
[*]Join Today and Enjoy The fun![/ul]

[size=large]Why RevonX?[/size]

[ul][*]RevonX has a great community of player’s inwhich are active and love to play because the server is just addicting.We strive for excellence and that’s what we’ve carried on with this server, has wonderful caring staff who take there time outof having fun playing to help you. Then we got the great economy. Economy is perfected we got the correct shop’s,drops and skill’s to boost your wealth. The server is almost always being update so no worries for any bug’s dupes etc as they have most likely already been patched. Donator’s in our server are the people who keep the system running as all our earnings goes towards the server for next month’s vps and such! So when donating its not going to the wrong place. Hope you guys take the time to check out RevonX and eventually stay. Thank you![/ul]
